predicate.note: Frames file for topple'' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet entry 45.4 (other causative), many many other framed members. Comparison with 'fall'.

example.name: ergative
example.text: A 10-gallon water cooler had toppled onto the floor, soaking the red carpeting.

example.name: agentive
example.text: John toppled the stack of Mary's library books.
example.arg: the stack of Mary's library books
